changelog:
- Complete overhaul of settings menu, added tabs and new settings.
- Now you can set default behavior for skipping mod selection, automatically call install function upon download/update finished, etc.
- Now manager will try its best to guide (first-time) users to download or install modpacks and lovely injector.
- Bug fixes.

modpacks.name: Dimserenes-Modpack
modpacks.description:
A full-featured modpack including as many mods as possible.
Talisman branch is available for Talisman mod and mods that depend on it.

modpacks.name: Fine-tuned-Pack
modpacks.description: A carefully crafted modpack for an optimized gameplay experience.

modpacks.name: Vanilla-Plus-Pack
modpacks.description: Enhances the core game with small improvements while staying true to the original experience.

modpacks.name: Cruel-Pack
modpacks.description: A harsh and unforgiving modpack for experienced players.

modpacks.name: Experimental-Pack
modpacks.description: Contains relatively new and experimental mods, for fresh new features and concepts.
